name: Volcanic Eruption
introduction: Volcanic eruptions can be explosive and dangerous. Here's what you need to know to stay safe.
beforeFlood: Familiarize yourself with the evacuation routes and prepare an emergency kit.

steps.text: Evacuate immediately if advised by authorities.
Avoid areas downwind of the volcano to reduce exposure to ash and toxic gases.
Stay indoors with windows and doors closed, and place damp cloths at door thresholds and other draft sources.
Wear long-sleeved shirts and long pants to protect your skin from ash fall.
Use a dust mask or hold a damp cloth over your face to help with breathing if you must go outside.
